allPostsData.title: When to Use Static Generation v.s. Server-side Rendering
allPostsData.excerpt: We recommend using **Static Generation** (with and without data) whenever possible because your page can be built once and served by CDN, which makes it much faster than having a server render the page on every request. ...

allPostsData.title: Two Forms of Pre-rendering
allPostsData.excerpt: Next.js has two forms of pre-rendering: **Static Generation** and **Server-side Rendering**. The difference is in **when** it generates the HTML for a page. ...
